def.dt: :in whatever manner or way that will help however I can
:in whatever manner or way shall serve you, sir, truly, however else Shakespeare
:to whatever degree or extent has done this for however many thousands of years Emma Hawkridge
:in spite of that :on the other hand still seems possible, however, that conditions will improve would like to go; however, I think I'd better not
:how in the world however did you manage to do it
